mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.xunlian_name as xunlianName ,a.xunlian_uuid_number as xunlianUuidNumber ,a.xunlian_photo as xunlianPhoto ,a.xunlian_types as xunlianTypes ,a.xunlian_kemu as xunlianKemu ,a.xunlian_time as xunlianTime ,a.xunlian_content as xunlianContent ,a.xunlian_delete as xunlianDelete ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number as yonghuUuidNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM xunlian a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.xunlian_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xunlianName},'%')
and a.xunlian_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xunlianUuidNumber},'%')
and a.xunlian_types = #{params.xunlianTypes}
and a.xunlian_kemu like CONCAT('%',#{params.xunlianKemu},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.xunlian_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xunlianTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.xunlian_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xunlianTimeEnd})
and a.xunlian_time = #{params.xunlianTime}
and a.xunlian_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xunlianContent},'%')
and a.xunlian_delete >= #{params.xunlianDeleteStart}
and a.xunlian_delete <= #{params.xunlianDeleteEnd}
and a.xunlian_delete = #{params.xunlianDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.insert_time = #{params.insertTime}
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuUuidNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
